statement.text: A target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 740 could be met within 6 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay down $2,108 of your total revolving/open account balances of $31,618 every month for 6 months.
Pay all your bills on time for 6 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that the time since your most recently opened account ages to 1 year, 1 month.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 6 years, 11 months.
Do not apply for any new credit.
